items.title: Drand Bridge Pallet | Retroactive Funding
items.content:
## Introduction

Ideal Labs is working to develop onchain randomness solutions for substrate based chains and beyond. To date, we have participated in the web3 foundation’s grant program, where we developed a prototype version of a substrate-based randomness beacon. We are currently participants in the decentralized futures program. The work presented here is not covered within our contract with DF.

Verifiable randomness is a critical component for enabling fairness in decentralized protocols. Unfortunately, existing solutions for Substrate-based chains have limitations. We are proposing retroactive funding to support the development and maintenance of a [Drand](<https://drand.love>) to Substrate bridge, bringing drand's verifiable randomness to Kusama.

We developed a [drand bridge pallet](<https://github.com/ideal-lab5/pallet-drand>), allowing Substrate-based runtimes to consume verifiable randomness from Drand's [Quicknet](<https://drand.love/blog/quicknet-is-live-on-the-league-of-entropy-mainnet>). It can be used as a drop-in replacement anywhere the Randomness trait is used. We also built a node that supports host functions built with the [arkworks-extensions](<https://github.com/paritytech/arkworks-extensions>) library, which is required to efficiently verify drand's pulses. Finally, we developed a chain extension and smart contract environment so that the output of drand can be used within ink! smart contracts, along with a demonstration rock-paper-scissors game.

Key Benefits of this work include:

- Robust and Verifiable onchain randomness: drand enables highly secure, robust, verifiable randomness. With this work, it is easy to use it both within pallets and smart contracts.
- Timelock Encryption: drand's output enables us to build timelock encryption capabilities on top of the beacon, enabling new kinds of use cases for trustless protocols, such as trustless asset swaps, [keyless crypto wallets](<https://forum.polkadot.network/t/a-keyless-wallet-concept-using-timelock-encryption/7096>), and more.
- Potential Ecocsystem Growth: EVM-based blockchains perform pairing operations poorly, so there is no cost-efficient drand > ETH bridge (though one does exist through Starknet). In general, EVM-based applications rely on VRF-based randomness-as-a-service solutions like Chainlink VRF, which carries a significant cost (also: no timelock encryption). This solution uses optimized arkworks extensions to efficiently compute pairings on-chain.

This post is to ask for feedback and review of our proposal for retroactive funding of our work on:

- a [drand bridge pallet](<https://github.com/ideal-lab5/pallet-drand>)
- a [node template supporting arkworks host functions](<https://github.com/ideal-lab5/ideal-node-template>)
- a [chain extension]([https://github.com/ideal-lab5/pallet-drand/blob/158a0b85eb50c9ecc20a4a33d6349e8c6c6b402e/substrate-node-template/runtime/src/lib.rs#L853) and [contract environment](<https://github.com/ideal-lab5/contracts>) for using randomness in ink! smart contracts
- A demo dapp: [casino-style rock-paper-scissors](<https://github.com/ideal-lab5/rock-paper-scissors>)

Retroactive funding will allow us to maintain and enhance this pallet, where we will work to support other beacons (e.g. NIST's beacon) and eliminate current limitations (see proposal). Our goal is for this to be an easy-to-use module for other networks - solochain or parachain - to acquire secure verifiable randomness and timelock encryption capabilities.

Read the full proposal here: [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1wjn8Il3O5A51MU24CUdOhNyoU2YAABrLsWiOckM8Kg4/edit?usp=sharing](<https://docs.google.com/document/d/1wjn8Il3O5A51MU24CUdOhNyoU2YAABrLsWiOckM8Kg4/edit?usp=sharing>)

items.title: Polkadot Apps/Tools Discovery Platform
items.content:
Discover a wide variety of apps, blockchains, wallets, and explorers, built on the Polkadot ecosystem by developers and contributors from across the globe.

   ### 1. Inspiration

Polkadot is home to parachains and app chains, with new ones being created every day. There is a growing need for a central hub where each parachain and app chain is covered and explained in simple terms for non-technical people.  Our vision is to create a unified hub that streamlines the discovery and engagement process for developers and users alike

### 2. Key Features

- **User-Friendly Interface**: Intuitive design for easy navigation and discovery.
- **Search and Filter**: Advanced search and filtering options to find specific projects or categories.
- **Project Profiles**: Detailed project profiles with descriptions, team information, and links.
- **Real-Time Data**: Real-time updates and data aggregation from on-chain and off-chain sources.
- **Campaign Management**: Tools for creating and managing campaigns/quests with reward system

### 3. Why Polkadot Needs a Unified Platform for Discovery

Polkadot is home to parachains and app chains, with new ones being created every day. There is a growing need for a central hub where each parachain and app chain is covered and explained in simple terms for non-technical people. This unified platform would:

- Centralize Information: Provide a single place to discover all parachains and app chains.
- Simplify Understanding: Break down complex projects into easy-to-understand descriptions.
- Increase Accessibility: Make the Polkadot ecosystem more accessible to a wider audience.
- Enhance Visibility: Help new projects gain visibility and traction within the community.
- Foster Engagement: Encourage more people to explore and engage with the ecosystem


### 4. TIMELINE &  ROADMAP

** Phase 1: Design and Prototyping (Month 1.2)**

- **UI/UX Design**: Create wireframes and mockups for the platform's interface.
- **Prototype Development**: Build an interactive prototype to demonstrate the platform's key features and functionalities.
- Feedback Collection: Gather feedback from  potential users to refine the design
- private beta release

Budget ($4700)

Phase 2: Public Launch (Month 2)

public Release: Launch the first version of the platform to public
User Feedback: Collect and analyze feedback from users to identify areas for improvement.
Bug Fixes: Address any issues and bugs reported by users.
Ongoing Support: Provide ongoing support and maintenance to ensure platform stability.
Continuous Improvement: Collect feedback from users and continuously improve the platform with new features and updates.

budget($5300)

   About Me

I'm Abdul Kabugu, and I've been contributing to Polkadot for the past 1.5 years. I am the winner of multiple Polkadot hackathons, including the[ APAC HACKATHON](https://x.com/KabuguAbdul/status/1703648646116278290)  and the developer of the famous Dapp, a decentralized video sharing platform (**frentube**)  My latest contribution is **POLCONNECT** ([POLCONNECT LINK](https://polconnect.kabugu.xyz/)), a React  library designed to ease substrate wallet connection for developers. With the Polkadot Apps/Dapps Discovery Platform, I aim to create a central hub to aggregate projects and foster community  You can reach me at kabuguabdul2@gmail.com.  OR  via [twitter/X  twitter / x](https://x.com/KabuguAbdul)

items.title: QueryWeb3
items.content:
Proponent: H1qzURXmYGLfwMsviLpMeN8S9zjAPmc1LBCSeQkCAieKUFs

Date: 2024/08/20-2024/11/20

Proposal Payment: 3270 KSM($56833)

Project Category:  software development

Short description: Focused on the Polkadot and Kusama ecosystem, we provide the most valuable BI and efficient AI-powered information service platform. Our goal is to address the fragmentation of information and data across various projects, thereby aggregating data within the Polkadot and Kusama ecosystem. This improves information retrieval and transaction efficiency, enhances the user experience, and increases user satisfaction.

Website: https://queryweb3.com

Contact: lechangxu@gmail.com

### Background:
Based on the cross-chain Polkadot and Kusama ecosystem, we have identified several key issues:

1. Current State and Development Trends: What is the current state of important information within the Polkadot ecosystem, and what are the development trends? Are there opportunities and risks involved?
2. Significant Activities and On-Chain Events: What are the significant activities and on-chain events happening in the Polkadot ecosystem right now?
3. Top Staking Yields: Which chains and pools offer the top 10 staking yields?
4. Top TVL Projects: Which projects have the top 10 Total Value Locked (TVL)?
5. Airdrops and NFT Rewards: Which projects offer airdrops and NFT rewards, and can I, as a user and investor, participate?

Finding answers to these questions can be challenging because data and information are fragmented and dispersed across various projects within the Polkadot ecosystem. This fragmentation not only reduces the efficiency of information retrieval and usage, leading to a poor user experience, but also significantly increases information asymmetry. Consequently, this lowers the efficiency of information utilization within the Polkadot ecosystem and affects its competitive advantage in the blockchain industry.Therefore, how to provide users with timely and integrated valuable information from all projects in the Polkadot ecosystem has become very important.

### Pain points

1. How to find the highest yielding financial products at present? Which chains are they on?
2. If we raise an information question in the Polkadot ecosystem, can we get timely and effective feedback?
3. What are the major movements in the Polkadot ecosystem wallets? What have they done?
4. What activities are there in each of the Polkadot and kusama ecosystem projects?
5. Can we still send some NFT benefits to target users?
6. What airdrops are there in the Polkadot ecosystem projects? Which airdrops can I participate in?
7. Based on the Polkadot and Kusama ecosystem, which projects are in the top 10 for on-chain transaction volume and transaction amount on a weekly, monthly, quarterly, semi-annual, and annual basis? Additionally, what are their year-over-year and month-over-month data?

### Solution

1. Query the yield rates of financial products in various projects in the Polkadot ecosystem based on keyword conditions.
2. Analyze the data of any address in the Polkadot ecosystem including wallet data analysis 、 data dashboard and so on.
3. The abnormal situation of large whale transactions in the Polkadot ecosystem recently
4. Ranking of important financings in the Polkadot ecosystem.
5. NFT and peripheral merchandise mall
6. Customized airdrop solution for many polkadot projects in future.
7. AI powered information service.
8. Provide equivalent data for on-chain transaction volume and transaction amount on a weekly, monthly, quarterly, semi-annual, and annual basis, as well as year-over-year and month-over-month growth data.

### Return
In this project, the Kusama treasury will receive 5% equity, while the Polkadot treasury will receive 10% equity.

### RoadMap

- v1.0 Focus on developing web2 through BI data and AI empowerment, aiming to reach a target user base of over 10,000
- v2.0 Improve the economic model and governance plan.
- v3.0 Develop value-added services: such as providing quantitative regular investment services and other hematopoietic businesses . Perhaps some businesses can be decoupled and restructured as application chain solutions.


Full Proposal: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ZG3Ru9-nLQu99j3_SXFM3NSMBpjNNIFHkkOvr8svaW0/edit?usp=sharing

items.title: Subscan | Infrastructure Costs of Subscan for Kusama & Statemine Networks (from April to June 2024)
items.content:
Subscan is an essential block explorer and analytics tool for the Kusama network, providing valuable insights to the Kusama community. However, maintaining and operating Subscan requires a significant investment of resources, including server infrastructure, security, and personnel costs. Therefore, we propose reimbursing the operation and maintenance fees for Subscan for the period from April to June 2024 from the Kusama treasury to ensure its continuous operation and maintenance.

**Total**

We believe that this reimbursement proposal will help ensure the continuous operation and maintenance of Subscan, contributing to the growth and development of the Kusama network. We are applying for a total of $56,144.12 USD from the Kusama Treasury, which includes $41,230.47 USD for reimbursement from April to June and a $14,913.65 USD advance payment to be deducted from the reimbursement for July to September. 


**Exchange rate**

The final KSM amount will be calculated based on EMA7 at the time of official submission.

https://kusama.subscan.io/tools/price_converter？value=56144.12&type=block&from=USD&to=KSM&time=24378073

2024-08-07 10:00:12 (+UTC), Block #24378005

KSM EMA7 Price ( USD ): 17.886421;

Number of KSM: 3138.924215


**View the detailed proposal here:**

**https://docs.google.com/document/d/1wEkLKR_TVTJ-WK1JttkO17TeHEzwdkXhaW3duMeOWY0/edit?usp=sharing**

----
🙏Thanks to the community's careful review and feedback, this proposal has been corrected.

----
🙏Thank you all for your understanding, support, and the constructive feedback and discussions. I'm pleased to see such a thoughtful and responsible approach to community governance, and I will do my best to respond to every feedback.

While the costs outlined in this proposal are fully justified, as most relate to expenses incurred before June, we believe that Kusama’s unique positioning merits access to the premium resources that Subscan provides. We've consistently worked to reduce costs, but our current infrastructure is built to deliver a high-quality, well-maintained explorer rather than a basic tool. This commitment to excellence and ongoing upgrades is central to our service, and it’s not something we can easily adjust in the short term without compromising the value we bring.

We understand the concerns raised by the community, and we acknowledge the financial strain on our company due to advancing these costs under the current reimbursement model. If this proposal is not approved, it would unfortunately leave us with no choice but to immediately halt all Subscan services on the Kusama network, including the explorer, API, and related services. We would then need to resubmit the outstanding invoices until a resolution is reached.

We truly hope to continue supporting Kusama and contributing to its growth. Your support is crucial in allowing us to maintain the high standard of service that the network deserves.

items.title: Freelancing Platform Development
items.content:
### Short Description:
[UniversalDot Foundation](https://universaldot.foundation/) is building a decentralized freelancing application using Substrate. 

A Minimum Viable Product of the [application](https://universaldot.me/) has already been built by completing a [grant](https://github.com/w3f/Grants-Program/pull/714) from WEB3 Foundation.

We request additional Treasury funds to continue the application's development and launch. 

The current [MVP application](https://app.universaldot.me/) has already been deployed. To learn more, please navigate to our [documentation](https://docs.universaldot.me/) or explore the [demonstration videos](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gaoo6LoZydg&list=PLecEhYhLLqu72Vh0nqgSHS1jv76DTDyvj&index=4&t=1s).  

We are requesting your comments to check if the community is currently interested in funding this development. Your feedback and comments are appreciated. 


The full proposal can be [read here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1_fiX_zpunbHCEwHlOkIT1IFRlPrJ2Xuy/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=105283746296807145921&rtpof=true&sd=true).

### Project Overview

![Vision](https://imgur.com/LRJ6v9n.jpeg)
![](https://i.imgur.com/yhbdrR6.jpeg)
![](https://imgur.com/qCy2tJM.jpeg)
![](https://imgur.com/KuSjzK0.jpeg)

### Additional documentation regarding the project:

- [Architecture](https://drive.google.com/file/d/13C9IRIX49AjfZEB-MI9dXG3gX-cdTgBp/view?usp=sharing)
- [Software Requirements Specification](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HvYvb7N1A9uT_9UhrAq1mV38RtjyfVv-/view?usp=sharing)

- [Vision Lightpaper](https://github.com/UniversalDot/documents/blob/master/docs/UniversalDot_Vision.pdf)

items.title: College Blockchain IUR(Industry-University-Research) Cooperation
items.content:
Proposal: College Blockchain IUR(Industry-University-Research) Cooperation  
Proponent: GoJFTV1woTYY24MJhB3bBrWLrmH1RfHBxawo4Lt24fMbrnU  
Date: July 31, 2024  
Requested KSM: to be completed at submission, we apply for 1911 KSM total allocation for August 2024 - October 2024 (3 month) depending on EMA(30) AVG rate (KSM = 22.29 USDT)  
  
Short description: Accelerate the enthusiasm of Dotsama ecosystem builders to participate and cultivate more potential high-quality developers potential users to enter the Polkadot ecosystem.

Review of previous proposal voting processes

Although the first two proposals were not passed, we are well aware that this is a result of the community's careful and responsible evaluation of the proposal content and the hope to do better. In the first proposal vote, we applied for a semester-long budget, because the courses we offer cannot be interrupted midway. However, based on the opinions given by the community, the second application to the treasury reduced the budget to 3 months, but our workload will not be reduced by half.

During the second vote we had received a lot of positive feedback from the community and adjusted a lot of work content after careful consideration and received widespread recognition and support, but unfortunately the vote was maliciously sniped three times from three anonymous addresses suspected to be the same voter during the confirmation period and failed to pass. We still welcome this sniper to actively communicate with us and provide constructive feedback to help us better improve our work content, and sincerely hope that all parties can support us again.

From the last proposal vote to this time, the 30-day moving average price of KSM has changed from $25 USDT to $22.29 USDT. So the amount applied for this proposal has changed.  
  
Before you read the proposal, please see the information about us and the contracts as below：

[https://docs.google.com/document/d/1rjOjTYholcG0HdLnnNFRRRHjk2ilErUzL6qrY6wUgOI/edit?usp=sharing](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1rjOjTYholcG0HdLnnNFRRRHjk2ilErUzL6qrY6wUgOI/edit?usp=sharing)

There were very few participants in every Dotsama offline event in China, China is a huge market but Dotsama’s influence is not enough, so I think cooperation with universities will be a good solution, the promotion will be more efficient.

Problem and Solution

The basis for the continued prosperity of the Dotsama ecosystem is a steady stream of high-quality developers. We very much agree with the educational philosophy and practical results of Polkadot Blockchain Academy (PBA).However, the high participation threshold and steep learning experience, especially English-taught courses, have dampened the enthusiasm of a large number of potential developers and builders. We believe that in the Chinese community, there should be an introductory course for PBA and a mechanism for a large number of undergraduate graduates to participate in the construction of Dotsama.

To this end, we will establish IUR-DAO and cooperate with six Chinese universities (more universities will be involved in the future). We offer PBA-based Chinese introduction courses in these six universities to guide potential developers and users to the Dotsama ecosystem through a combination of undergraduate graduates' learning, innovation and entrepreneurship. Briefly, we intend to carry out four main tasks in this proposal:

1.  Cooperate with Six Universities on the Dotsama ecological project.
2.  Create PBA-based Chinese introduction courses and train the university’s blockchain course instructors.
3.  Carry out graduate project design and entrepreneurial practice or join an existing parallel chain team for internship.
4.  Guide and recommend outstanding graduates to participate in Polkadot Hackathon.

In the future, we will make improvements based on the actual results of this project and promote it to more Chinese universities to cooperate with us.

Please see the Introduction to partner universities、budget and further informations:

[https://docs.google.com/document/d/19b1YnfxyFYTryvRU4VWt6fygRqGuFdw4eohlIefCHmo/edit?usp=sharing](https://docs.google.com/document/d/19b1YnfxyFYTryvRU4VWt6fygRqGuFdw4eohlIefCHmo/edit?usp=sharing)

Key Results and Goals

Workscope & OKR Breakdown: August 2024 - October 2024

Objective：Accelerate the enthusiasm of Dotsama ecosystem builders to participate and cultivate more potential high-quality developers to enter the Dotsama ecosystem.

**Postscript : Since every September to the following January is the opening season which is the first semester in China, and the second semester is the graduation season, from February to July, our proposal workload is based on semester statistics,However, after the first application to the treasury was rejected, the community suggested changing it to three months, but our workload will not reduce by half. So the work content below is still based on semesters.**

1、PBA Chinese introduction course

OKRs for the 6 months period of this proposal:

\-Completed the Chinese translation of PBA-Book.Based on the technical characteristics of Polkadot and the necessary knowledge points for developing basic applications, combined with the actual knowledge level of undergraduates, the PBA English course has been appropriately tailored.

\-Trained for CUIT instructors how to use the PBA Chinese introductory course.

\-Use the PBA Chinese introduction courses to train around 900 undergraduate students in each university

\-The recorded live streams will be uploaded to YouTube channel.

\-Select highlights from the live streams will also be transcribed into text and published as articles.

2、Cooperation framework with universities

OKRs for the 6 months period of this proposal:

\-Sign cooperation agreements with more universities.

\-Developed an innovation and entrepreneurship Dotsama training plan for over 3000 students.

-   Innovative training project: Undergraduate students individually or in teams, under the guidance of instructors, independently complete the design of polkadot innovative experimental methods and write summary reports, etc. The innovation training project advocates the application of projects based on practical problem research combined with the needs of cutting-edge technology in the blockchain industry, and is encouraged to be combined with undergraduate graduation thesis (design).
-   Parachain training project: Under the guidance of school instructors, each student plays one or more specific roles in the project implementation process. By conducting feasibility studies, preparing parachain plans, and simulating operations, Carry out a certain level of coding, write entrepreneurial reports, etc.
-   Entrepreneurship practice project: Under the joint guidance of school mentors and business mentors, student teams use the results of previous innovation and entrepreneurship training projects to propose an innovative product or service with market prospects, and carry out entrepreneurial practice activities based on this. -Distributing all contents across more than 3 largest blockchain media or communities outlets in China.

3、Educational Contents Production

OKR for the 6 months period of this proposal:

\-Select 100 outstanding papers from 1000 undergraduate graduation papers and publish them in no less than 5 mainstream blockchain media or communities in China.The total number of delivery times is not less than 100\*5.

\-Topics other than outstanding papers include introducing infrastructure projects in the Polkadot ecosystem, parachains,helping the community understand ecological diversity and the experiences during the learning process.

\-Design and produce a graduation certificate in the form of NFT.

4、User metrics

OKR for the user growth goal we want to achieve based on the above three work results:

\-Target users: more than 3000 users to enter the Dotsama ecosystem.

\-Potential builders: more than 50.

\-marketing means:

-   Publish a Dotsama-related article every month to attract users to follow the Wechat official account.
-   Host 1 online/offline activities once a month and transfer the user from the broadcast room to the Wechat official account. I
-   nclude a follow method at the end of all our videos.
-   Occasionally release our own custom-designed Dotsama swags to attract users to follow and share articles to increase article views.
-   Each month, we collaborate with one ecosystem project to launch small user growth activities, such as DeFi liquidity provision, staking, gift giveaways, and airdrops. These are specifically designed events that require close coordination with the eco teams.

5、Reporting

IUR-DAO will focus on the Polkadot technical education in China assisting the Dotsama Community to expand the impact and cooperate with potential projects to help them build the dApp on Polkadot. We will publish a Monthly Review and Report on Polkassembly on the last day of every month, including performance data and all activities and materials created, to be shared with the Direction channel and comments on our original proposals for regular updates.

Why us？

We are one of the first domestic units engaged in improving professional skills in the digital economy under the general outline of the "Digital China Development Plan". The founding team was invited to participate in China's second global blockchain industry conference in 2016. Summit Forum, in 2018, it cooperated with the first batch of blockchain universities in China, such as Tsinghua University, China University of Political Science and Law, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Shenzhen University, etc., and was inspected by national leaders. At the end of 2020, in accordance with the national vocational education policy and combined with the requirements of industry, market and enterprise development, the unit recommended that the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security establish a new profession of blockchain operator and was approved. At the same time, it participated in the formulation of the "National Vocational Skills Standards for Blockchain Application Operators (2021 Edition)" and is the only professional skill level certification organization for blockchain application operators in Zhejiang Province. Certification work such as "Blockchain Application Operator", "Digital Twin Application Technician" and "Digital Solution Designer" can be carried out within Zhejiang.In April 2023, the first batch of "AIGC Application Engineer" and "Prompt Engineer" courses in the country was opened providing teaching services: courses and training systems, multimedia teaching systems.

We rely on the digital economy industry venture capital fund to cultivate talents and industrial investment and incubation action paths, fully tap the needs of local industry improvement and momentum conversion, and support the development of major Internet companies and emerging industries through talent cultivation and industry It combines development with smart technology and digital-real linkage and conversion with local industries to achieve social significance such as digital economic transformation and regional economic growth.

For specific information about the further information about this project, please send us an email for consultation.Email address: iur.pro@protonmail.com.

-   Innovative training project: Undergraduate students individually or in teams, under the guidance of instructors, independently complete the design of polkadot innovative experimental methods and write summary reports, etc. The innovation training project advocates the application of projects based on practical problem research combined with the needs of cutting-edge technology in the blockchain industry, and is encouraged to be combined with undergraduate graduation thesis (design).
-   Parachain training project: Under the guidance of school instructors, each student plays one or more specific roles in the project implementation process. By conducting feasibility studies, preparing parachain plans, and simulating operations, Carry out a certain level of coding, write entrepreneurial reports, etc.
-   Entrepreneurship practice project: Under the joint guidance of school mentors and business mentors, student teams use the results of previous innovation and entrepreneurship training projects to propose an innovative product or service with market prospects, and carry out entrepreneurial practice activities based on this. -Distributing all contents across more than 3 largest blockchain media or communities outlets in China.

3、Educational Contents Production

OKR for the 6 months period of this proposal:

\-Select 100 outstanding papers from 1000 undergraduate graduation papers and publish them in no less than 5 mainstream blockchain media or communities in China.The total number of delivery times is not less than 100\*5.

\-Topics other than outstanding papers include introducing infrastructure projects in the Polkadot ecosystem, parachains,helping the community understand ecological diversity and the experiences during the learning process.

\-Design and produce a graduation certificate in the form of NFT.

4、User metrics

OKR for the user growth goal we want to achieve based on the above three work results:

\-Target users: more than 3000 users to enter the Dotsama ecosystem.

\-Potential builders: more than 50.

\-marketing means:

-   Publish a Dotsama-related article every month to attract users to follow the Wechat official account.
-   Host 1 online/offline activities once a month and transfer the user from the broadcast room to the Wechat official account. I
-   nclude a follow method at the end of all our videos.
-   Occasionally release our own custom-designed Dotsama swags to attract users to follow and share articles to increase article views.
-   Each month, we collaborate with one ecosystem project to launch small user growth activities, such as DeFi liquidity provision, staking, gift giveaways, and airdrops. These are specifically designed events that require close coordination with the eco teams.

5、Reporting

IUR-DAO will focus on the Polkadot technical education in China assisting the Dotsama Community to expand the impact and cooperate with potential projects to help them build the dApp on Polkadot. We will publish a Monthly Review and Report on Polkassembly on the last day of every month, including performance data and all activities and materials created, to be shared with the Direction channel and comments on our original proposals for regular updates.

Why us？

We are one of the first domestic units engaged in improving professional skills in the digital economy under the general outline of the "Digital China Development Plan". The founding team was invited to participate in China's second global blockchain industry conference in 2016. Summit Forum, in 2018, it cooperated with the first batch of blockchain universities in China, such as Tsinghua University, China University of Political Science and Law, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Shenzhen University, etc., and was inspected by national leaders. At the end of 2020, in accordance with the national vocational education policy and combined with the requirements of industry, market and enterprise development, the unit recommended that the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security establish a new profession of blockchain operator and was approved. At the same time, it participated in the formulation of the "National Vocational Skills Standards for Blockchain Application Operators (2021 Edition)" and is the only professional skill level certification organization for blockchain application operators in Zhejiang Province. Certification work such as "Blockchain Application Operator", "Digital Twin Application Technician" and "Digital Solution Designer" can be carried out within Zhejiang.In April 2023, the first batch of "AIGC Application Engineer" and "Prompt Engineer" courses in the country was opened providing teaching services: courses and training systems, multimedia teaching systems.

We rely on the digital economy industry venture capital fund to cultivate talents and industrial investment and incubation action paths, fully tap the needs of local industry improvement and momentum conversion, and support the development of major Internet companies and emerging industries through talent cultivation and industry It combines development with smart technology and digital-real linkage and conversion with local industries to achieve social significance such as digital economic transformation and regional economic growth.

For specific information about the further information about this project, please send us an email for consultation.Email address: iur.pro@protonmail.com.
history.title: College Blockchain IUR(Industry-University-Research) Cooperation

history.content:
Proposal: College Blockchain IUR(Industry-University-Research) Cooperation  
Proponent: GoJFTV1woTYY24MJhB3bBrWLrmH1RfHBxawo4Lt24fMbrnU  
Date: July 5, 2024  
Requested KSM: to be completed at submission, we apply for 1911KSM total allocation for August 2024 - October 2024（3 month） depending on EMA(30) AVG rate（ KSM = 22.29 USDT）  
  
Short description: Accelerate the enthusiasm of Dotsama ecosystem builders to participate and cultivate more potential high-quality developers potential users to enter the Polkadot ecosystem.

Review of previous proposal voting processes

Although the first two proposals were not passed, we are well aware that this is a result of the community's careful and responsible evaluation of the proposal content and the hope to do better. In the first proposal vote, we applied for a semester-long budget, because the courses we offer cannot be interrupted midway. However, based on the opinions given by the community, the second application to the treasury reduced the budget to 3 months, but our workload will not be reduced by half.

During the second vote we had received a lot of positive feedback from the community and adjusted a lot of work content after careful consideration and received widespread recognition and support, but unfortunately the vote was maliciously sniped three times from three anonymous addresses suspected to be the same voter during the confirmation period and failed to pass. We still welcome this sniper to actively communicate with us and provide constructive feedback to help us better improve our work content, and sincerely hope that all parties can support us again.

From the last proposal vote to this time, the 30-day moving average price of KSM has changed from $25 USDT to $22.29 USDT. So the amount applied for this proposal has changed.  
  
  

Before you read the proposal, please see the information about us and the contracts as below：

[https://docs.google.com/document/d/1rjOjTYholcG0HdLnnNFRRRHjk2ilErUzL6qrY6wUgOI/edit?usp=sharing](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1rjOjTYholcG0HdLnnNFRRRHjk2ilErUzL6qrY6wUgOI/edit?usp=sharing)

There were very few participants in every Dotsama offline event in China, China is a huge market but Dotsama’s influence is not enough, so I think cooperation with universities will be a good solution, the promotion will be more efficient.

Problem and Solution

The basis for the continued prosperity of the Dotsama ecosystem is a steady stream of high-quality developers. We very much agree with the educational philosophy and practical results of Polkadot Blockchain Academy (PBA).However, the high participation threshold and steep learning experience, especially English-taught courses, have dampened the enthusiasm of a large number of potential developers and builders. We believe that in the Chinese community, there should be an introductory course for PBA and a mechanism for a large number of undergraduate graduates to participate in the construction of Dotsama.

To this end, we will establish IUR-DAO and cooperate with six Chinese universities (more universities will be involved in the future). We offer PBA-based Chinese introduction courses in these six universities to guide potential developers and users to the Dotsama ecosystem through a combination of undergraduate graduates' learning, innovation and entrepreneurship. Briefly, we intend to carry out four main tasks in this proposal:

Cooperate with Six Universities on the Dotsama ecological project. Create PBA-based Chinese introduction courses and train the university’s blockchain course instructors. Carry out graduate project design and entrepreneurial practice or join an existing parallel chain team for internship. Guide and recommend outstanding graduates to participate in Polkadot Hackathon. In the future, we will make improvements based on the actual results of this project and promote it to more Chinese universities to cooperate with us.

Please see the Introduction to partner universities、budget and further informations:

[https://docs.google.com/document/d/19b1YnfxyFYTryvRU4VWt6fygRqGuFdw4eohlIefCHmo/edit?usp=sharing](https://docs.google.com/document/d/19b1YnfxyFYTryvRU4VWt6fygRqGuFdw4eohlIefCHmo/edit?usp=sharing)

Key Results and Goals

Workscope & OKR Breakdown: August 2024 - October 2024

Objective：Accelerate the enthusiasm of Dotsama ecosystem builders to participate and cultivate more potential high-quality developers to enter the Dotsama ecosystem.

Postscript : Since every September to the following January is the opening season which is the first semester in China, and the second semester is the graduation season, from February to July, our proposal workload is based on semester statistics,However, after the first application to the treasury was rejected, the community suggested changing it to three months, so the work content below is still based on semesters.

1、PBA Chinese introduction course

OKRs for the 6 months period of this proposal:

\-Completed the Chinese translation of PBA-Book.Based on the technical characteristics of Polkadot and the necessary knowledge points for developing basic applications, combined with the actual knowledge level of undergraduates, the PBA English course has been appropriately tailored.

\-Trained for CUIT instructors how to use the PBA Chinese introductory course.

\-Use the PBA Chinese introduction courses to train around 900 undergraduate students in each university

\-The recorded live streams will be uploaded to YouTube channel.

\-Select highlights from the live streams will also be transcribed into text and published as articles.

2、Cooperation framework with universities

OKRs for the 6 months period of this proposal:

\-Developed an innovation and entrepreneurship Dotsama training plan for over 3000 students.

-   Innovative training project: Undergraduate students individually or in teams, under the guidance of instructors, independently complete the design of polkadot innovative experimental methods and write summary reports, etc. The innovation training project advocates the application of projects based on practical problem research combined with the needs of cutting-edge technology in the blockchain industry, and is encouraged to be combined with undergraduate graduation thesis (design).
-   Parachain training project: Under the guidance of school instructors, each student plays one or more specific roles in the project implementation process. By conducting feasibility studies, preparing parachain plans, and simulating operations, Carry out a certain level of coding, write entrepreneurial reports, etc.
-   Entrepreneurship practice project: Under the joint guidance of school mentors and business mentors, student teams use the results of previous innovation and entrepreneurship training projects to propose an innovative product or service with market prospects, and carry out entrepreneurial practice activities based on this. -Distributing all contents across more than 3 largest blockchain media or communities outlets in China.

3、Educational Contents Production

\-Topics other than outstanding papers include introducing infrastructure projects in the Polkadot ecosystem, parachains,helping the community understand ecological diversity and the experiences during the learning process.

\-Design and produce a graduation certificate in the form of NFT.

4、User metrics

OKR for the user growth goal we want to achieve based on the above three work results:

\-Target users: more than 3000 users to enter the Dotsama ecosystem.

\-Potential builders: more than 50.

\-marketing means:

-   Publish a Dotsama-related article every month to attract users to follow the Wechat official account.
-   Host 1 online/offline activities once a month and transfer the user from the broadcast room to the Wechat official account. I

-   Each month, we collaborate with one ecosystem project to launch small user growth activities, such as DeFi liquidity provision, staking, gift giveaways, and airdrops. These are specifically designed events that require close coordination with the eco teams.

IUR-DAO will focus on the Polkadot technical education in China assisting the Dotsama Community to expand the impact and cooperate with potential projects to help them build the dApp on Polkadot. We will publish a Monthly Review and Report on Polkassembly on the last day of every month, including performance data and all activities and materials created, to be shared with the Direction channel and comments on our original proposals for regular updates.

Why us？

We are one of the first domestic units engaged in improving professional skills in the digital economy under the general outline of the "Digital China Development Plan". Summit Forum, in 2018, it cooperated with the first batch of blockchain universities in China, such as Tsinghua University, China University of Political Science and Law, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Shenzhen University, etc., and was inspected by national leaders. items.title: Reassign the curator of bounty 11
items.content:
Sorry, as the previous curator of [bounty 11](https://kusama.subsquare.io/treasury/bounties/11), we failed to extend the last expiry and are unassined by [this extrinsic](https://kusama.subscan.io/extrinsic/24150656-2). We propose to reassign us as the curator, so we can finish our work.

Achievements since [last top up proposal](https://kusama.subsquare.io/referenda/215):
- Refactor vesting scan.
- Extract assets pallet scan and fix bugs.
- Add a package to scan recovery pallet business.
- Support proxy pallet scan.
- Create a graphql server to serve most business data including identity, multisig, recovery, proxy and vesting.
- Developed new fronted pages for vesting, recovery.
- Refactor fronted pages of assets to adapt new graphql API.

Failures:

- We failed to bring more developers by child bounties. The main reason is that a child bounty collaboration is very time consuming even after collaborations with my team. It may take monthes for a candidate to finish the job which can be done by OpenSquare under 1 or 2 weeks.

Plan: as we finished [proxy scan](https://github.com/opensquare-network/statescan-v2/pull/922) recently, implementing proxy related UIs is our next work plan.

items.title: ParaSpell XCM Tools Server costs coverage and 6 months of Maintenance Proposal
items.content: ## Dear Kusama community, ##  Meet ParaSpell: ## A set of powerful XCM Tools ready to elevate your project cross-chain experience ## This is the current state of tools: There are five tools from which - one is core (SDK) for the three (API, ROUTER, VISUALIZATOR). Each tool can be installed independently. - [XCM SDK](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-sdk): Core component for API, Router and Visualizator. Meant to unify the cross-chain experience on Polkadot and become a layer 2 protocol that allows for seamless integration of XCM into your dApps. XCM SDK groups all 54 integrated XCM-compatible Parachain XCM Pallets into one uniform package and allows you to generate cross-chain calls with just one line. - [XCM Router](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-tools/tree/main/packages/xcm-router): (SpellRouter☄️): Meant to allow you to create XCM calls where you receive different assets than assets you send (Eg. Send -> DOT from Polkadot, receive ASTR on Astar)—all in just one call. - [XCM API](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-tools/tree/main/apps/xcm-api): (LightSpell⚡️): Meant to ease the integration of XCM interoperability into your dApp, offload your dApp from heavy computing and save you costs. LightSpell implements XCM SDK and XCM Router into simple API endpoints. - [XCM Analyser](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-tools/tree/main/packages/xcm-analyser): Tool to convert XCM Multilocations to human-readable format. Written in emphasis on minimalistic dependency list. - [XCM Visualizator](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-tools/tree/main/apps/visualizator-fe): Tool to visualize XCM in the Polkadot ecosystem. Browse through history, explore selected Parachains, filter accounts engaging in XCM the most and more all in exciting 3D universe-like visualization. ## The core and the only XCM SDK you will ever need Created, when there were no other SDKs for XCM in the ecosystem. At the sole beginning of Polkadot. Born from a wild idea, to unify the XCM experience in the ecosystem. Meet our battle-hardened and well-established [XCM SDK](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-sdk). [![sdk](https://github.com/dudo50/dudo50/assets/55763425/4348e5e4-b4cc-4205-a890-41efc6cfac15)](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-sdk) ### The abilities you gain by using XCM SDK: - Ability to transfer XCM messages from/to 54 different XCM compatible Parachains (Number of compatible chains fluctuates as some of them are added/removed) - Support for all three XCM transfer scenarios (UMP - Para to Relay, DMP - Relay to Para, HRMP - Para to Para) - Support for multi-asset transfers and fully customizable multi-locations (for destination chains, accounts and currencies) - Customizable XCM version (If our preselected version stops working, you can select one that works with just one simple parameter) - Asset claim feature with reduced parameters (Only 3 parameters required - chain, amount and address) - Polkadot <> Kusama bridge implemented for both DOT & KSM transfers - Testing on testnet or localhost (You can input custom WS port parameter or even custom Parachain ID) - Useful [transfer info queries](https://paraspell.github.io/docs/sdk/xcmPallet.html#xcm-transfer-info) (Query fees, expected delivery amount and other transfer-related info all in just one query) - Front-end related data queries - useful [asset queries](https://paraspell.github.io/docs/sdk/AssetPallet.html), [XCM pallet queries](https://paraspell.github.io/docs/sdk/NodePallets.html), [existential deposit queries](https://paraspell.github.io/docs/sdk/xcmPallet.html#query-existential-deposit) and more! - Ability to use a keep-alive kind of XCM transfer which checks the balance of the account on the destination chain and determines if the amount you send is sufficient. **XCM SDK has since the last 9 months of maintenance had a total of 23506 downloads on NPMJS** ## Sending one asset cross-chain and receiving another was never this easy Meet our latest state-of-the-art technology called [XCM-Router](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-tools/tree/main/packages/xcm-router). It is easy to implement and has plenty of awesome features like automatic exchange chain selection! Featuring **524** asset exchange pools makes it the largest liquidity routing tool in the Polkadot. Try it out via [playground](https://playground.paraspell.xyz/)! [![router](https://gist.github.com/assets/55763425/5f920adc-14b0-4e17-b294-42d422f3d3c2) ](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-tools/tree/main/packages/xcm-router) ### You gain the following advantages by implementing SpellRouter☄️: - The ability to transfer assets cross-chain via XCM while being able to exchange them for another asset all within one call. - Offlift users from the complexity of moving assets to another chain in order to exchange tokens just to send them to another chain later - Developers able to hide asset exchange complexity and skip multiple implementation steps - Developers save the time required for complex research - Complex logic hidden in simple one-line calls - Seamlessly works for both Polkadot signers (ID 32) as well as EVM signers (Key 20) **XCM ROUTER has since it was introduced 199 days ago (Dec 15th. 2023) had a total of 15161 downloads on NPMJS** ## Want to go packageless and save space? We got you Meet our [award-winning](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/angelhack_polkadothackathonapac-activity-7108072292718428160-i1dr/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop) and first [XCM API](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-tools/tree/main/apps/xcm-api) in the ecosystem. XCM API packs every XCM SDK and XCM-Router feature and allows you to implement XCM packagelessly. [![api](https://gist.github.com/assets/55763425/2110d141-991b-4a03-a3e7-d1e1f5b51f03)](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-tools/tree/main/apps/xcm-api) ### The advantages of LightSpell⚡️ XCM API for developers: - XCM API reduces call construction time to seconds - Built-in user error prevention for seamless operation - Built-in Token authentication for DDoS prevention - Easy to use tech stack: Typescript, Nest.js, ParaSpell XCM-SDK & XCM Router - Also designed for simple private deploy - API Offloads your server from heavy computing required to construct calls (You receive constructed message already) - API saves you server costs (Because of the reason mentioned above) - API features Package-less integration (No need to install anything compared to SDK alternatives) - API is simple to implement (Constructed to be as dev-friendly as possible) - API is live on the following link: [https://api.lightspell.xyz]() **XCM API Served since its launch 287 days ago (September 13th. 2023) a total of 359817 requests and faced 0 downtime** ## Unable to decode complex XCM? Say no more Developed in collaboration with PolkadotJS (Now implemented in [PolkadotJS Extension-UI](https://github.com/polkadot-js/extension/blob/d26efafeb138bb287a584591ac76af0b22c5be7e/packages/extension-ui/package.json#L25)) XCM-Analyser lets you decode XCM Multilocations into human-readable format while being lightweight with minimalistic dependency list. Check it out in our [Playground](https://playground.paraspell.xyz/xcm-analyser-sandbox). [![analyser](https://gist.github.com/assets/55763425/7ce358e5-bfa6-472f-a305-68276e09686d)](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-tools/tree/main/packages/xcm-analyser) **XCM Analyser has since it was introduced 77 days ago (Apr 15th. 2024) had a total of 1578 downloads on NPMJS** ## Exploring XCM in stunning, universe-like 3D Visualization was never this straightforward Discover our [award-winning](https://www.polkadotglobalseries.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/DSC6920-Enhanced-NR-scaled.jpg) and first XCM-Visualization oriented tool in the ecosystem - [XCM Visualizator](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-tools/tree/main/apps/visualizator-fe). Built to enhance data science around XCM. Scientists can visualize XCM-related information with ease in remarkable 3D and 2D visualizations. Now more available than ever - https://xcm-visualizator.tech/. [![visualizator](https://gist.github.com/assets/55763425/6637e6e4-d84e-477d-bf18-ec3f3644eae5)](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-tools/tree/main/apps/visualizator-fe) ### The advantages you gain in XCM Visualizator: - Gain insights into network scalability over time with detailed historical analysis - Identify the most active chains in cross-chain messaging - Monitor the accounts with the highest cross-chain messaging activity - Discover the most frequently used channels - Track the most commonly transferred assets - Access comprehensive details for any selected chain, including simultaneous multi-chain analysis - Personalize colour schemes to highlight key details effectively - Enjoy the benefits of an open-source platform that is completely free forever ## Implementation made easy with our [docs](https://paraspell.github.io/docs/) Meet our comprehensive [documentation](https://paraspell.github.io/docs/) covering just about every topic developers will meet with when implementing XCM and our tools into their dAPPs. [![docs](https://gist.github.com/assets/55763425/e32b7595-89bf-4515-8875-e12e1b9a9bbb)](https://paraspell.github.io/docs/) **Docs had a total of 137 refactor and update deployments on GitHub pages since their launch** ## Our team and history: - By now we completed 5️⃣ Web 3 Foundation grants meant to fund the development of our common good tools. This goes to show our dedication to the topic and the community. They can be observed here: Phase 1, Phase 2, Phase 3, Phase 4 and [Phase 5](https://github.com/w3f/Grants-Program/pull/2057). - We have been granted trust from the Kusama community 3️⃣ times in the following maintenance proposals that helped us further perfect our tools: Maintenance 1, [Maintenance 2](https://kusama.polkassembly.io/referenda/277) and [Maintenance 3](https://kusama.polkassembly.io/referenda/344) is historically 🥇first maintenance related referenda to receive **100% AYE** support. - Some of our tools are partially / fully funded by participation in Hackathons (To maximize self-sufficiency when developing state-of-the-art tools): - XCM API was co-funded with 🥇first place at the Polkadot Global Series APAC 2023 Hackathon in the XCM Integration track. Here is the final announcement post. - The XCM Visualizator was fully funded by 🥈second place at the Polkadot Global Series North America 2024 Hackathon in the XCM Integration track. Here is the result announcement - Our knowledge and funds are reinvested into professional research articles 👨‍🏫 - Promoting Polkadot and ParaSpell in the long run at international research conferences (We occupy the first page when you search "Polkadot XCM" on [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?hl=sk&as_sdt=0%2C5&q=polkadot+xcm&btnG=&oq=polka)). Conferences we choose are with higher standards and higher Z-indexes. We were so far able to publish a total of 5️⃣ professional research articles: - Sharing fungible assets across Polkadot Paraverse: IEEE ICECET 2022 - [link](https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/9872938/) - Enhancing XCMP Interoperability Across Polkadot Paraverse: IEEE ICBC 2023 - [link](https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/10174872) - ParaSpell XCM SDK: A New Protocol for Interoperability in Polkadot Paraverse: IEEE BCCA 2023 - [link](https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/10338906) - Cross-Chain Payments on Blockchain Networks: An Apartment Booking Use-Case: ACM SAC 2024 - [link](https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/3605098.3636137) - Interlinked Transactions: Revolutionizing Apartment Bookings through Cross-Chain Payments: BCCA 2024 - [link](https://www.researchgate.net/publication/380904884_Interlinked_Transactions_Revolutionizing_Apartment_Bookings_through_Cross-Chain_Payments) - Cross-Chain Non-Fungible Assets Sharing on Polkadot - Currently submitted to the conference and in the review process **The team behind the project has been hacking in the Polkadot ecosystem for a while now.** Consisting of 2 members: - Dušan Morháč: [PBA 2023 Buenos Aires Alumni](), Building in ecosystem since 2021, [LINKEDIN](), [GITHUB](). - Michael Absolon: Typescript expert with 4 years of professional experience, Building in the ecosystem since 2022, [LINKEDIN](), [GITHUB](). Both team members achieved their Master's degree recently (June 2024) and are working on ParaSpell full-time. Dušan continues to study for a Doctoral degree (To be able to continue research passion and release more research papers for Polkadot and ParaSpell). ## Aim of this proposal: The proposal aims to aid server costs and maintenance for the 🥇 first [XCM API](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-tools/tree/main/apps/xcm-api) and [XCM Visualizator](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-tools/tree/main/apps/visualizator-fe) in the Polkadot and Kusama ecosystem. Maintaining XCM API, [XCM ROUTER](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-tools/tree/main/packages/xcm-router) and XCM Visualizator also include maintaining its core component - [XCM SDK](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-sdk). These common good tools along with [XCM Analyser](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-tools/tree/main/packages/xcm-analyser), [XCM Playground](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-tools/tree/main/apps/playground), [Documentation](https://github.com/paraspell/docs) and [Landing page](https://github.com/paraspell/xcm-tools/tree/main/apps/landing-page) will be fully maintained for the mentioned period starting on 1st August 2024 and ending on 1st February 2025. This proposal allows all tools to remain completely free for the entire Polkadot and Kusama communities. It also allows our team to dedicate time to help other teams that wish to implement our tools. ### What are you getting by implementing one of our tools or more - Complex free support with implementation (Through a private telegram group between our and your team (We usually respond within minutes and we are also open to live calls when time plays a role in your project delivery - form to reach out to us can be found on our [Landing page](https://lightspell.xyz/))) - Prompt issue solving if any occurs (Feel free to open an issue in any repo) - Constant updates for every package (We strive to bring new features for each tool) - Comprehensive [documentation](https://paraspell.github.io/docs/) for each tool - Reliability (Checked each month for changes in Pallets or compatible Parachains) - **Guarantee, that everything is free for everyone. The ParaSpell✨ team aims to deliver only the common good, be completely open-source and free with no hidden costs or subscriptions.** ### What are you getting as a non-developer/dApp user by supporting this proposal - Our products allow dApps to be created much faster, so you can enjoy their benefits quicker. - You can be sure, that dApp implementing our tool is safe for XCM as our tools are thoroughly tested and regularly updated. There are multiple ways to lose assets cross-chain. - You too can try our products via the [Playground](https://playground.paraspell.xyz/). - We have been in the ecosystem for a while now and we are hardcore ecosystem fans. We will continue maintaining the tools even if we are short of funding (Just at a slower pace). So you do not have to deal with your dApp suddenly disabling your favourite feature. This is because we primarily build and maintain these tools to make life easier for everyone - not for profits (There is no business model or hidden fees in any of our tools. They are purely common good). ## Proposal schedule - Discussion: 1. July. 2024 - 8. July. 2024 - Voting: 9. July. 2024 - 22. July. 2024 ## Proposal ask The proposal seeks 48.000$ worth of funding for 6 months of various maintenance tasks and assistance to other teams. This is divided into 8.000$ per month and 25$ per developer work hour. More information can be found in the full proposal document. ## Documents associated with this proposal: **[Full proposal (Contains detailed information on how we plan to use funds)](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Dd9kDmWW6Le0O7wB5ZpAbCI4ifcfEELtFk_zGE0m_yQ/edit?usp=sharing)** [One pager]() [Documentation for XCM Tools]()

items.title: College Blockchain IUR(Industry-University-Research) Cooperation
items.content:
**Proposal: College Blockchain IUR(Industry-University-Research) Cooperation**

**Proponent:** GoJFTV1woTYY24MJhB3bBrWLrmH1RfHBxawo4Lt24fMbrnU

**Date:** July 5, 2024

**Requested KSM**: to be completed at submission, we apply for 1704 KSM total allocation for August 2024 - October 2024（3 month） depending on EMA(30) AVG rate（ KSM = 25 USDT）

**Short description:** Accelerate the enthusiasm of Dotsama ecosystem builders to participate and cultivate more potential high-quality developers potential users to enter the Polkadot ecosystem.

**Before you read the proposal, please see the information about us and the contracts as below：**

[https://docs.google.com/document/d/1rjOjTYholcG0HdLnnNFRRRHjk2ilErUzL6qrY6wUgOI/edit?usp=sharing](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1rjOjTYholcG0HdLnnNFRRRHjk2ilErUzL6qrY6wUgOI/edit?usp=sharing)

There were very few participants in every Dotsama offline event in China, China is a huge market but Dotsama’s influence is not enough, so I think cooperation with universities will be a good solution, the promotion will be more efficient.

**Problem and Solution**

The basis for the continued prosperity of the Dotsama ecosystem is a steady stream of high-quality developers. We very much agree with the educational philosophy and practical results of Polkadot Blockchain Academy (PBA).However, the high participation threshold and steep learning experience, especially English-taught courses, have dampened the enthusiasm of a large number of potential developers and builders. We believe that in the Chinese community, there should be an introductory course for PBA and a mechanism for a large number of undergraduate graduates to participate in the construction of Dotsama.

To this end, we will establish IUR-DAO and cooperate with six Chinese universities (more universities will be involved in the future). We offer PBA-based Chinese introduction courses in these six universities to guide potential developers and users to the Dotsama ecosystem through a combination of undergraduate graduates' learning, innovation and entrepreneurship. Briefly, we intend to carry out four main tasks in this proposal:

1.  Cooperate with Six Universities on the Dotsama ecological project.
2.  Create PBA-based Chinese introduction courses and train the university’s blockchain course instructors.
3.  Carry out graduate project design and entrepreneurial practice or join an existing parallel chain team for internship.
4.  Guide and recommend outstanding graduates to participate in Polkadot Hackathon.

In the future, we will make improvements based on the actual results of this project and promote it to more Chinese universities to cooperate with us.

**Please see the Introduction to partner universities、budget and further informations:**

[https://docs.google.com/document/d/19b1YnfxyFYTryvRU4VWt6fygRqGuFdw4eohlIefCHmo/edit?usp=sharing](https://docs.google.com/document/d/19b1YnfxyFYTryvRU4VWt6fygRqGuFdw4eohlIefCHmo/edit?usp=sharing)

**Key Results and Goals**

Workscope & OKR Breakdown: August 2024 - October 2024

Objective：Accelerate the enthusiasm of Dotsama ecosystem builders to participate and cultivate more potential high-quality developers to enter the Dotsama ecosystem.

Postscript : Since every September to the following January is the opening season which is the first semester in China, and the second semester is the graduation season, from February to July, our proposal workload is based on semester statistics,However, after the first application to the treasury was rejected, the community suggested changing it to three months, so the work content below is still based on semesters.

**1、PBA Chinese introduction course**

**OKRs for the 6 months period of this proposal:**

\-Completed the Chinese translation of PBA-Book.Based on the technical characteristics of Polkadot and the necessary knowledge points for developing basic applications, combined with the actual knowledge level of undergraduates, the PBA English course has been appropriately tailored.

\-Trained for CUIT instructors how to use the PBA Chinese introductory course.

\-Use the PBA Chinese introduction courses to train around 900 undergraduate students in each university

\-The recorded live streams will be uploaded to YouTube channel.

\-Select highlights from the live streams will also be transcribed into text and published as articles.

**2、Cooperation framework with universities**

**OKRs for the 6 months period of this proposal:**

\-Sign cooperation agreements with more universities.

\-Developed an innovation and entrepreneurship Dotsama training plan for over 3000 students.

1.  Innovative training project: Undergraduate students individually or in teams, under the guidance of instructors, independently complete the design of polkadot innovative experimental methods and write summary reports, etc. The innovation training project advocates the application of projects based on practical problem research combined with the needs of cutting-edge technology in the blockchain industry, and is encouraged to be combined with undergraduate graduation thesis (design).
2.  Parachain training project: Under the guidance of school instructors, each student plays one or more specific roles in the project implementation process. By conducting feasibility studies, preparing parachain plans, and simulating operations, Carry out a certain level of coding, write entrepreneurial reports, etc.
3.  Entrepreneurship practice project: Under the joint guidance of school mentors and business mentors, student teams use the results of previous innovation and entrepreneurship training projects to propose an innovative product or service with market prospects, and carry out entrepreneurial practice activities based on this.

\-Distributing all contents across more than 3 largest blockchain media or communities outlets in China.

**3、Educational Contents Production**

**OKR for the 6 months period of this proposal:**

\-Select 100 outstanding papers from 1000 undergraduate graduation papers and publish them in no less than 5 mainstream blockchain media or communities in China.The total number of delivery times is not less than 100\*5.

\-Topics other than outstanding papers include introducing infrastructure projects in the Polkadot ecosystem, parachains,helping the community understand ecological diversity and the experiences during the learning process.

\-Design and produce a graduation certificate in the form of NFT.

**4、User metrics**

**OKR for the user growth goal we want to achieve based on the above three work results:**

\-Target users: more than 3000 users to enter the Dotsama ecosystem.

\-Potential builders: more than 50.

\-marketing means:

-   Publish a Dotsama-related article every month to attract users to follow the Wechat official account.
-   Host 1 online/offline activities once a month and transfer the user from the broadcast room to the Wechat official account.
-   Include a follow method at the end of all our videos.
-   Occasionally release our own custom-designed Dotsama swags to attract users to follow and share articles to increase article views.
-   Each month, we collaborate with one ecosystem project to launch small user growth activities, such as DeFi liquidity provision, staking, gift giveaways, and airdrops. These are specifically designed events that require close coordination with the eco teams.

**5、Reporting**

IUR-DAO will focus on the Polkadot technical education in China assisting the Dotsama Community to expand the impact and cooperate with potential projects to help them build the dApp on Polkadot. We will publish a Monthly Review and Report on Polkassembly on the last day of every month, including performance data and all activities and materials created, to be shared with the Direction channel and comments on our original proposals for regular updates.

**Why us？**

We are one of the first domestic units engaged in improving professional skills in the digital economy under the general outline of the "Digital China Development Plan". The founding team was invited to participate in China's second global blockchain industry conference in 2016. Summit Forum, in 2018, it cooperated with the first batch of blockchain universities in China, such as Tsinghua University, China University of Political Science and Law, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Shenzhen University, etc., and was inspected by national leaders. At the end of 2020, in accordance with the national vocational education policy and combined with the requirements of industry, market and enterprise development, the unit recommended that the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security establish a new profession of blockchain operator and was approved. At the same time, it participated in the formulation of the "National Vocational Skills Standards for Blockchain Application Operators (2021 Edition)" and is the only professional skill level certification organization for blockchain application operators in Zhejiang Province. Certification work such as "Blockchain Application Operator", "Digital Twin Application Technician" and "Digital Solution Designer" can be carried out within Zhejiang.In April 2023, the first batch of "AIGC Application Engineer" and "Prompt Engineer" courses in the country was opened providing teaching services: courses and training systems, multimedia teaching systems.

We rely on the digital economy industry venture capital fund to cultivate talents and industrial investment and incubation action paths, fully tap the needs of local industry improvement and momentum conversion, and support the development of major Internet companies and emerging industries through talent cultivation and industry It combines development with smart technology and digital-real linkage and conversion with local industries to achieve social significance such as digital economic transformation and regional economic growth.

For specific information about the further information about this project, please send us an email for consultation.Email address: iur.pro@protonmail.com.

items.title: DAO: Driving Blockchain Adoption in LATAM Organizations
items.content:
*DAO: Driving Blockchain Adoption in LATAM Organizations*

*Objective:*
GrowDAO aims to enhance the use of the Kusama network by implementing real-world use cases in formal organizations and DAOs. The initiative focuses on using blockchain for treasury management, payments, and governance over a three-month period.

*Business Development Strategy:*
- Onboard DAOs into the Virto and Kusama/Polkadot ecosystems.
- Engage 22 interested organizations through educational and onboarding programs.
- Cover transaction fees, purchase memberships, and provide a small experimental treasury.

*Current Approach:*
- One-on-one relationships with key stakeholders.
- Maintain a digital presence to attract new DAOs and prospects.
- Strengthen the image of the Kusama/Polkadot/Virto ecosystems for businesses and markets.

*Outcomes:*
- Provide a comprehensive report with metrics, onboarded DAOs, and insights.
- Develop a foundation for future business development teams in the Kusama ecosystem.
- Encourage the inclusion of traditional businesses in LATAM to explore blockchain solutions.

*Context:*
- For the past three months, GrowDAO has engaged various organizations to demonstrate blockchain benefits.
- Initiatives include digital marketing experiments and networking strategies.
- Insights reveal a lack of knowledge and technical support in adopting blockchain solutions.

*Problems Identified:*
1. Lack of knowledge about web3 technology.
2. Need for support in blockchain onboarding.
3. Lack of budget for blockchain experimentation.

*Solutions Proposed:*

1. *Web3 Education:*
   - Tailored educational programs for organizations to experiment with blockchain.
   - Previous success with crash courses on digital identity, business architecture, and web3 technology.

2. *School for DAOs:*
   - Personalized advisory programs highlighting blockchain benefits.
   - Curriculum covering web3 introduction, blockchain basics, wallets, digital identity, tokens, governance, and more.

3. *Targeted Onboarding and Incentive Programs:*
   - Incentives for social and private organizations to explore blockchain.
   - Provision of treasury funds, memberships, and DAO formalization support.

4. *DAO Incubator:*
   - Grants for creating and managing DAOs.
   - Digital business assessment tool to track DAOs’ progress.
   - Focus on payment to suppliers, onboarding new DAOs, and receiving payments in KSM.

5. *Digital Presence:*
   - Implement digital marketing strategies to build community and convert users.
   - Manage social media, SEO, and SEM positioning.

*Budget:*
- *Marketing:* $2,500
  - DAO Schools: $300
  - Networking Events: $400
  - Referral Program: $800
  - Social Media Management: $500
  - Google Ads: $500
- *DAO Establishment:* $2,500 for 10 DAOs ($250 each)
- *Team Salaries:* $12,000 for 4 members over 3 months ($1,000 per month each)
- *GrowDAO Treasury:* $3,000
- *Total Budget:* $20,000 (870 KSM at EMA 7: $23 USD)

*Funds Management:*
- Submitted through Roberto Heredia address.
- Funds allocated to GrowDAO Treasury via multi-sig later on Kreivo-Virto.
- Collective decision-making for fund allocation and execution.

This proposal aims to leverage the Kusama network’s capabilities, onboard new DAOs, and provide a structured approach to blockchain education and adoption in the LATAM region.

[Document](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1o8hONztg47uEzsd6JttDe_NFQQi44Rz1/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=110353380380132837700&rtpof=true&sd=true)
